itemDescription: United States Navy Medal of Honor recipient

wikipedia_page.main: William Spicer (May 28, 1864 – December 14, 1949) was a gunner's mate first class serving in the United States Navy during the Spanish–American War who received the Medal of Honor for bravery. He was the great-grandfather of former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer.

response: *William Spicer (Medal of Honor) (1864–1949), gunner's mate in the United States Navy who received the Medal of Honor
*William Spicer (MP for Exeter) (c. 1735–1788), British MP for Exeter, 1767–1768
* William Spicer (Medal of Honor), American Medal of Honor recipient
